tweet.full_text: Today I made a grid with direction-aware hover effect in #react for my #portfolio. Not quite perfect yet but a good first step. #webdeveloper #javascript #FrontEnd. https://t.co/TqThCEnvsK

I made a variable font in #react using #styledcomponents. #frontend #webdeveloper #javascript #portfolio

https://t.co/Ej5BYVBK4r https://t.co/1MlGZgLIDU

And here's my #portfolio, a Gatsby static site hosted on GitHub pages. It was a lot of fun to do, using styled components and react spring. I feel like I'm pretty close to getting some more interesting animations done. #WebDeveloper #javascript #juniordev https://t.co/h7qysj5Anp
I'm re-building my old github #portfolio website! I've learnt so much since I last worked on it. Really excited to see what I have learnt. #webdevelopment #webdeveloper #softwaredeveloper #coding
